You almost miss the Altar, as you mistake it for some decoration or vanity. Carved out of a single onyx slab, the young girl raises a bowl toward you, bidding for an offering, sightless eyes forever fixed upon the sky.

> [[ Velika's Tomb - Lesser Celestial Materialization Altar ]]
> [[ Offer Celestial Gems ]]
* Create Celestial Artifact
* Enhance Celestial Artifact
* Empower Mundane Item

"This is where they made their offerings." You take another cautious look around. Something seems a little off.

"And apparently, buried someone." Nel folds his arms. "God, I hope that body doesn't get up. I will actually freak."

"Ehehehe." Ayla's ignoring the rest of you, giggling like a maniac at the sight of the Altar. "Someone beat us here, but... wow, I'm not sure how to react."

"Looks like we can upgrade items here, too." Nel says. "I'm gonna hold off, though. There's a certain allure to the idea of my own special artifact."

"Mhm," Vision says. "Same here. Let's hope we last that long, eh?"

Tatsumaki, of course, smiles and nods.

"Ah, wheels are turning." Nel says, hopping up and down a bit. "That girl outside, with a familiar. They're the ones who looted this place, and the room upstairs. I bet it's an Artifact too."

"Something to let you capture a monster?" Vision folds his arms.

"We could ask them." Nel says.
